name: test_e2e_with_logs[201_CMD_BASIC_015]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASIC_015` |
| **Name** | AND operator with whoami |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | basic_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |
